dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Welcome to our adventure game, I'm a brave knight on a quest to slay the dragon.

dialogues.speaker: Dragon
dialogues.text: Ha! You think you can defeat me? I'll breathe fire and burn your village to ashes!

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Not if I have anything to say about it, I've been practicing my sword fighting skills just for this moment.

dialogues.speaker: Dragon
dialogues.text: We'll see about that, let's dance with swords and see who comes out on top!
